Language.text: Ah, here’s our guest! I almost thought you wouldn’t dare to come in
Do you like games? The kind where you can win something truly valuable?
The rules here are very simple. Take a seat
This is your opponent. Trust me, he’s already eager to tear your throat out
And this is you. A brave knight… like in the tales where the hero saves the world
But no matter how strong he may seem it’s just a fragile little figure
One wrong move and it breaks
Ah, I almost forgot to mention!
Your life is on the line
Make too many mistakes, and the show will end for you forever
All you need to do is follow the ball. Guess right and you strike. Lose focus and you’ll miss
Let’s start simple. 3 cups and 1 ball
Your turn - guess where it is
And here’s your reward. Everything’s fair, just as I promised
Our show began in the Puppet Theater
But the festival is huge! So where will you head next?
The number of your balls has increased. Now you should choose carefully which one to strike with
And now, for a trick that’s a little harder!
This time you can guess more than one ball
The more balls you guess the greater the reward, but the risks grow as well
Ah, the curtain fell so soon! I expected a tragedy, but got a comedy instead
But don’t be sad—an ending is just another performance for me
And here we are, the curtains part… the final boss is already waiting
I hope you’ve learned your lines?
Bravo! You did it! For a rehearsal, that was quite impressive
But the true climax still awaits you
My favorite act! Although… how many have we had already? Never mind
The curtain trembles, the actors are in place, and all eyes are on you
You’ve won, but… I never promised to let you leave alive, did I
I hope to see you again
Three paths, but only one leads to victory — choose
Don’t be afraid to make a mistake. Mistakes are the most fun!
Oh, I can already see your failure
Watch closely, this might be the last time
Oh, not a bad choice… oh… just kidding
One choice… and someone’s blood will be spilled. Maybe even yours
Look at that, you found it!
I thought you wouldn’t get it
Oh, applause again… but not for you!
Are you sure you’re not asleep?
I told you — pay closer attention
Now that’s a trick! Too bad it failed
How sweet, thanks for the free move
@okimmmy - Art%%@ccor3xx - Game Design, UI, Management%%@punkgagarin - Game Design, Programming%%@Kudgine_Solis - Narrative, Animation%%@Madgine_Solis - Programming
Open up, quickly! Curiosity is my favorite sin.
How unexpected! A gift for you. But don’t forget—free cheese only comes in a mousetrap.
Are you sure you’re ready to entrust your life to fate?
The dice are rolling, the stakes are rising! Will luck smile on you?
Didn’t even notice you’d walked into a trap again?
Ohh, a treasure chest! But not all that glitters is gold, right?
Sleeping so sweetly… are you sure you want to wake it?
Decide quickly—before your hands slip away.
Ring, ring… fortune favors the bold.
Reflections lie sometimes. Even more than I do.
The surprise inside is always sweeter. And more dangerous.
If your worst enemy turned out to be yourself—would you win?
Listen closely. Sometimes even lies can be useful.
A toast to the victor! Drink it all down—something’s waiting at the bottom.
Curiosity often ends with teeth at your throat.
Knock louder! Every strike brings the ending closer.
She’s waiting for a kiss. Dare to risk it?
These cards promise fortune or ruin, and they never lie. Unlike me.
Abracadabra! From nothing, a crowd of enemies appears. The audience goes wild!
Deals {0} critical damage to first enemy
Deals {0} critical damage to last enemy
Deals {0} critical damage to random enemy
Deals {0} critical damage to all enemies
